text: This. #PutItToThePeople #PeoplesVoteMarch
author: Liam_Beattie

text: The moment @tom_watson confirmed he will back @theresa_may’s deal but only if we #PutItToThePeople - listen to that response. #PeopesVoteMarch
author: Liam_Beattie

text:
The country’s new favourite baker @jessphillips 

“I trust the people more where I live than Theresa May to do the right thing for them” 

#PutitothePeople #PeopesVoteMarch
author: Liam_Beattie

text: We are one million strong. #PutItToThePeople #PeopleVoteMarch
author: Liam_Beattie

text: That is so wonderful.
author: Liam_Beattie

text: The love and compassion shown by @jacindaardern is so incredibly moving. She exemplifies every thing a political leader should be in these troubled times.
author: Liam_Beattie

text:
Wow. It’s hit over 3 million signatures AND still rising. 

#RevokeA50Now 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241584?fbclid=IwAR20ZXVV5EB7HYrQPAZWIFFOxDshCZ6v-A0uvmt7m50aPXz7nSd2koJbGEQ …
author: Liam_Beattie

text:
Right now our country’s future is being decided not by us but by 27 other heads of government. While Theresa May sits outside and waits. 

This isn’t taking back control. This is humiliating. 

#RevokeArticle50
author: Liam_Beattie

text:
A big thank you to the lovely people @hummingbbakery who donated these A-M-A-Z-I-N-G cakes to help with my @LondonMarathon fundraising. 

I’m running for @THTorguk and would  your support. X

https://www.justgiving.com/Liam-Beattie2
author: Liam_Beattie

text:
You know what we do have a choice about? 

Broadcasters choosing to give airtime to people who spout hate and bullsh*t. 

This person may give GMB a bump in viewing figures but it harms the already fragile mental health many LGBT people experience.
author: Liam_Beattie

text:
Can’t confirm it but apparently Philip Davis blocked the proposals for Relationships & Sex Education becoming compulsory. Shameful if true.

Our fight for LGBT inclusive sex ed has one final hurdle. Stay angry and make sure your MP votes yes next week.
author: Liam_Beattie

text: Every living room across the country right now after that statement.
author: Liam_Beattie

text:
The debate in Parliament should go some way to restore our faith in politics. Impassioned speeches from across the chamber about why we need LGBT-inclusive sex education that empowers all young people. 

A rare but powerful moment of political solidarity. #RSE
author: Liam_Beattie

text: Massive congrats!
author: Liam_Beattie

text:
Robust response from @AngelaRayner on the fact all schools are legally required to comply with the Equality Act. 

“There is no justifiable reason to stop teaching these issues”.
author: Liam_Beattie

text:
Fellow LGBT+ tweeters & allies 

Pissed off about yet MORE schools ending LGBT lessons? Well so am I. 

How about we do something about it?

Tomorrow MPs will vote on plans to make sex ed lessons LGBT-inclusive. Write to your MP & urge them to support.
author: Liam_Beattie

text:
"Morally we do not accept homosexuality as a valid sexual relationship to have. It's not about being homophobic"

Denying our right to existishomophobia.

End of.
author: Liam_Beattie

text: Yes. Looking at you @PaulJSweeney
author: Liam_Beattie

text: Naturally. Hoping for a heavily scuffed pair or Reebok trainers too.
author: Liam_Beattie

text:
Love seeing John Bercow in civilian clothing.  

Similar vibes to seeing your geography teacher in the local @Tesco buying a can of tuna, only WITHOUT A SUIT ON.
author: Liam_Beattie

text: As if we didn't have enough to worry about already. Drink up folks before it's all gone.
author: Liam_Beattie

text: This scene though. Kristin Scott Thomas playing a lesbian and Fleabag hinting at some queer credentials. This season just gets better and better. #Fleabag
author: Liam_Beattie

text: .@tom_watson is spot on. When I was 18.8 stone, I was lured by this promotion and continued to put my own health severely at risk. Food companies have responsibility to take obesity seriously, not fob us off by saying “but you can win a SALAD”.
author: Liam_Beattie

text:
We've seen parents wanting to airbrush our existence from lessons and shamefully some MPs try to justify this.

On Weds, MPs will vote on new Relationships & Sex Ed lessons regulations. Write to your MP & help win the fight for LGBT-inclusivity in schools
author: Liam_Beattie

text: Some really good updates and announcements coming out of #LGBTNatCon19, in particular latest on @WomenEqualities #GRA consultation response.
author: Liam_Beattie

text:
I’ll be on @BBCRadioScot at 11:50am talking about why I left Scotland and moved to London. 

Obviously the vibrant clothes market scene was a big factor.
author: Liam_Beattie

text: Thanks babe! X
author: Liam_Beattie

text: *blushes* why thank you. Got my mama to thank for them.
author: Liam_Beattie

text: Smashed 30km. I’m now absolutely shattered and plan to eat lots of pizza to ease the pain.
author: Liam_Beattie

text: Thanks love. You too!
author: Liam_Beattie

text: It was just 21km but smashed a 30km run today!
author: Liam_Beattie

text: I hope so!
author: Liam_Beattie

text: Wow. An absolutely incedible match. Scotland did themselves proud after being pretty much written off after the first half. #ENGSCO #BackingBlue
author: Liam_Beattie

text: Oh. My. Days. #ENGSCO #BackingBlue
author: Liam_Beattie

text:
Legs ached and feet just wanted to stop. Moments before this photo, I had  a little cry in Hyde Park. Training for a marathon is fu**king hard. 

But I’m getting close to smashing £1,000 and I need your help! RTs v welcome. 

@THTorguk 

http://justgiving.com/Liam-Beattie2
author: Liam_Beattie

text: I’ll make sure it’s added to my next performance supervision.
author: Liam_Beattie

text: YES please. And I will happily model, suitably photoshopped ofc.
author: Liam_Beattie

text: Gosh. I don’t think a photograph has ever resulted in so much sass directed towards me.
author: Liam_Beattie

text: how did you do that?

text: Been saving this little number by @philipnormal for a little while. Don’t think there’s a better week to whip it out.
